basic.title: now
basic.info: date-fns uses native date wherever possible

basic.title: string
basic.info: Accepts ISO 8601 format but will attempt to parse any other inputs

basic.title: format
basic.warning: Parsing with a format will only be available in version 2

basic.title: UTC
basic.info: date-fns uses native date wherever possible, open issue to add better support for UTC dates in date-fns
